details.description: No need to choose between Bushwick and BedStuy with this one! Live right on that line and enjoy one of the quickest growing and most popular neighborhoods today. With all the conveniences of and Broadway right outside and Myrtle Avenue just down the street, you'll have everything you need nearby. Quickly walk to a HUGE grocer (such a luxury in Brooklyn), bars and restaurants galore, and the easiest transportation ever! Conveniently located off the J and M trains as well as the B15, B38, B46, B47, and B54 bus routes. FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Excellent Natural Light! Shared Laundry Room Shared Roof Deck Bike Storage Parking (by availability) Pet Friendly for only $50/month!!

amenities.other: Hardwood Floors, Roof Access, Shared Outdoor Space

details.description: Virtual tours available! Beautiful 3 BR / 3 bath apartment in Williamsburg, prime location! This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathrooms, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Westlight, Brooklyn Bowl, Extra Fancy, Lucky Dog, Baby's All Right, Patrizia's, Battery Harris, Post Office, and Freehold. Short commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Only blocks from the L train, and a short walk to the JMZ trains

amenities.other: Balcony/Terrace, Central A/C, Dishwasher, Roof Access, Washer/Dryer In Unit

details.description:
77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors
Building Amenities: -State-of-the-art fitness center -Relaxing sauna -Basketball and tennis courts -Inviting indoor pool with direct access to outdoor pool deck -Multiple BBQ grilling areas -Rooftop retreat offering panoramic views -Residents lounge and versatile working space -Entertainment-filled recreation room -Secure bicycle storage -Convenient elevators -Parking garage available (additional fee applies)
Location: Enjoy seamless access to the new esplanade and ferry terminal, ensuring swift commutes to Manhattan.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances, Central A/C

Prime Crown Heights Living at 1499 Bedford Ave!
Discover the epitome of modern living at 1499 Bedford Ave, a new building in the heart of Crown Heights. Located steps from Eastern Parkway and multiple subway lines, and within walking distance of Grand Army Plaza, Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, and Prospect Park, this residence offers unparalleled convenience and vibrant city life.
Building Amenities:
State-of-the-art fitness room Pet wash station Laundry facilities (in-unit laundry in some units) Social lounge with game room Furnished rooftop with panoramic city views Second-floor public terrace Open workstations Dedicated mail room
Unit Features: Private terraces and balconies in select units Kitchen islands in select units Large windows with abundant natural light Stunning views of NYC skyline, Prospect Park, and neighborhood streets
Welcome to 1499 Bedford Ave?where luxury, community, and convenience meet. Experience the best of Crown Heights living.

details.description:
Welcome to the perfect place to call home at 19 East 31st Street in Flatbush! These stylish apartments offer modern comfort and convenience in the heart of the neighborhood. Conveniently located near the 5/2 trains and surrounded by shops, cafes, and more, with just a 35-minute train ride to Midtown.
Each unit features:
Spacious bedrooms Modern bathrooms with deep soaking tubs Plenty of natural light, hardwood floors, and high ceilings Beautiful kitchens with stone countertops and stainless steel appliances, including dishwashers Large windows in the living areas and bedrooms The building also offers fantastic amenities like laundry facilities, a package room, bike storage, a roof deck, and a courtyard.
Applying is easy, but you'll need good credit and income. Guarantors are welcome!
Situated in lively Flatbush, you'll have everything you need nearby, from shops and restaurants to parks and transportation.
Don't miss out on the opportunity for luxurious living at 19 East 31st Street. Schedule a viewing today and make it your new home!

details.description:
----- Luxury 3 bedroom 2 bath, available now ------
Housed in what was formerly known as the Empire State Dairy Company, The Highland is one of Brooklyn?s most recent landmarked buildings. Steeped in rich history, The residence now spans 14 stories and offers Studio, 1, 2, and 3 bedroom homes.
Our units feature ? Modern Elegant Kitchens ? Quartz Countertops ? Stainless Steel Appliances ? Panelized Dishwashers ? In-unit washer/dryer ? Floor- to- ceiling windows ? White Oak Flooring ? Mini split heating/cooling system
Bathroom features include ? White Oak Vanities ? Floor-to-ceiling grooved ceramic wall tiles ? Deep soaking tub ? Stone style floor tiles
Our building features ? Laundry room ? Bike Storage ? Resident Lounge ? Business Center ? Kids Playroom ? Fitness Center ? Rooftop Lounge ? Two Outdoor Terraces
Located just south of Highland Park, Cypress Hills is home to passionate individuals who share a strong appreciation for their neighborhood due to its rich and vibrant history, local bars, restaurants, and cafes, and community gardens, parks, and green spaces. Boasting 101 acres, Highland Park is situated on a high plateau and offers stunning views of the Ridgewood Reservoir, Rockaways, and Atlantic Ocean. Additional parks and green spaces include Shirley Chisholm State Park, Hamilton Beach Park, Sperandeo Brothers Playground, the Herbal Garden of East New York, George Walker Jr. Park, Martin Luther King Jr. Playground, Grace Playground, Noakhali Cricket Field, and Sutter Ballfields.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Central A/C, Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances

details.description: Virtual tours available!Do not miss out on this 3 bed / 1 bath apartment in Brooklyn's up and coming neighborhood Prospect Lefferts Gardens! People forget that Brooklyn is the biggest borough and offers some of the best, historic architecture. Enjoy the neighborhood's easy access to the B,Q,2,3 lines, a number of bus lines, and short distance to Prospect Park. Live within short distance to juice bars, grocery stores, restaurants, coffee shops, bars, pharmacies, banks, local bakeries, and more to explore. Brooklyn Greenery, MIdwood Flats, Irv's, Bluebird, Blessings, and Food Sermon are just a couple of the many options to check out in this vibrant neighborhood.Easy commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

Beautiful 3 bedroom/1.bth !
This apartment features Central AC, a video intercom, and hardwood floors, which create a fresh and comforting home feel while incorporating stylish designs. .
The building also offers amazing amenities such as a shared backyard rooftop, laundry facilities, and a gym.
Call to view today! No FEE!

Some of BedStuy's absolute best restaurant, bar, and coffee choices are right here off Bedford-Nostrand! This lively neighborhood will cater to all of your needs and more. With Herbert Von King park just down the street, bodegas on every other corner where they'll know you by name, and beautiful brownstones lining the streets, you get to enjoy the true history and culture of BedStuy, Brooklyn. Not to mention FULL SIZE grocers to both your right and your left, reallyyy upping the NYC convenience level!
Conveniently located right off the G train as well as the B38, B43, B44, and B52 bus routes.
FEATURES: Washer/Dryer IN UNIT! Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Central A/C and Heat Pet Friendly

details.description:
Introducing a beautiful, newly renovated 3 bedroom duplex in the desirable neighborhood of Stuyvesant Heights!
This spacious and sunny duplex offers a range of modern amenities and is ideally located on the border of Bushwick and Williamsburg, right in the heart of Bed Stuy. With its contemporary design and sleek finishes, this residence is a true gem.
Key Features:
Exposed Brick Walls Stainless Steel Appliances Hardwood Floors High Ceilings Laundry in Unit Dishwasher Stone Countertops Central AC Pet-Friendly Abundant Natural Light Roof Deck Step into this duplex and be captivated by the charming exposed brick walls that add character to the space. The kitchen boasts stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher, and features sleek stone countertops that complement the modern aesthetic. Throughout the duplex, you'll find beautiful hardwood floors and high ceilings that create an open and airy atmosphere. The convenience of an in-unit laundry facility adds to the comfort and practicality of this home.
For those hot summer days or relaxing evenings, central AC ensures that you stay cool and comfortable. Pets are welcome, so you can bring your furry companions along to enjoy this wonderful space with you. Natural light floods the rooms, creating a warm and inviting ambiance.
One of the highlights of this property is the roof deck, offering a perfect spot to unwind and soak in the surrounding views.
Transportation options are plentiful, with easy access to the J, Z, G, M, and other public transportation routes.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Private Roof Deck, Washer/Dryer In Unit

details.description: Check out this spacious 4-bedroom with exposed brick walls, ideal for those craving extra room. Enjoy a generously sized living area boasting impressive 13ft ceilings. Situated just a short stroll from the J, M, and Z Myrtle Ave Train station. Plus, two bedrooms come with built-in loft beds, perfect for maximizing space. Requirements include credit and income verification, with guarantors accepted. Additional features include central air, stainless steel appliances, ample cabinet space, and large closets.

This stylish duplex offers 3 bedroom and 2 full bathrooms in an unbeatable location!
Features:
Duplex layout Balcony Stainless steel appliances Dishwasher Home office space In-unit laundry A/C in each room Roof deck Video intercom system
No fee! Pets ok! Reach out today!

Introducing the Winslow, Astoria?s latest gem and waterfront marvel nestled in the charming Hallets Point neighborhood of Queens
This boutique tower stands as a testament to modern luxury, offering an unparalleled living experience with breathtaking views of both the tranquil waterfront and the iconic New York City skyline. Located in close proximity to buses and the ferry, the Winslow provides convenient access to transportation, ensuring that residents can easily explore the vibrant city beyond. The Winslow sets itself apart with its thoughtfully designed units, boasting spacious layouts, expansive windows, and private balconies in most residences. Revel in the beauty of these homes, featuring meticulously crafted kitchens with high-end appliances and elegantly tiled bathrooms. Each detail has been carefully curated to create a harmonious living space that combines comfort and sophistication.
This premier waterfront tower not only offers stunning residences but also an array of exceptional amenities. Residents can take advantage of convenient parking, secure bike storage, and a dedicated package room. The Winslow goes above and beyond with additional features like a well-equipped gym, game room, and business lounge. The rooftop, adorned with picturesque views and grilling stations, provides the perfect setting for social gatherings. With balconies in most units and a majority enjoying water views, the Winslow promises a lifestyle of tranquility and luxury. As the newest addition to Astoria, a neighborhood known for its proximity to Manhattan coupled with its serene ambiance, the Winslow stands out as a haven of modern living in the heart of the city.
